text: Fou Ts'ong (; 10 March 1934 - 28 December 2020) was a Chinese-born British pianist. He was perhaps best known for winning third prize and the Special Mazurka prize at the International Chopin Competition at Warsaw. He was born in Shanghai. Fou died of COVID-19 on 28 December 2020 in London, aged 86. == References == Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chinese pianists Category:British pianists Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in London Category:People from Shanghai
title: Fou Ts'ong
